entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing nullable reference types' warnings on invalid overrides #71477
  • Published package for the roslyn Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer feature #71474
  • Symbol - Static is not bold #71470
  • Show interface documentation #71469
  • IntelliSense feature request: Report references, which cannot be resolved (anymore) #71466
  • Automatically rename file while renaming containing type #71465
  • Action Command implementation under C# 8 #71463
  • Update DocumentationCommentId.CreateDeclarationId to return null instead of throw. #71460

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34503.99 #71475
  • "Request codeLens/resolve failed" error when using collection expression spread syntax #71339
    17.9
  • Whether a substring of a constant string within the scope of a constant should also be considered constants #71468
  • Add individual reference viewer for getter and setter in c# property #71467
  • Add options to disable automatically import "using static xxxxx;" #71464
  • Allow me to designate parameters as being regular expressions to gain syntax highlighting #71462
  • Interface constraints not used for generic interface covariance, leading to CS0266 #71301
  • Add option to "collapse declaration level within #regions when collapsing to definitions" #71450
  • Create a new Tools/Option tab for C#/VB Code Quality rules #30986
    Backlog
  • [API Proposal]:Attribute to execute the method at compile time #71438
  • Warn if a non-nullable field is used before it is set in the constructor #71437
  • Nullability warning when setting field from required property #71455
  • `()` is not parsed as empty tuple type in type argument list of method call #71378
  • Add the abbility to suppress CS1573 for a CancellationToken parameter #71356
  • Deprecate 'severity' field for IDE code style editorconfig syntax #44201
    Backlog
  • DiagnosticAnalyzer implementations need a syntax filter to exclude their overhead from unrelated light bulbs #55228
    17.6 P2
  • Add missing documentation for new IDExxxx code style analyzers #65757
  • Add documentation of IDE0120 #65758
  • Add documentation for IDE0240 #65765
  • Add documentation for IDE0241 #65766
  • MSBuildWorkspace doesn't raise warnings or errors if the app is targeting too low of a version of Roslyn #69578
    18.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Inline Rename] Cosmetic improvements to Rename Suggestions #71478
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Cleanup code with patterns #71472
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix nested code actions in VSCode #71457
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fixes nested code actions in LSP bug #71456
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use SyntaxTree.GetDisplayPath in SARIF logger #71454
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Standardize use of prepareMachine for ci cleanup #71265
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Purge line commit information upon projection span reset #71471
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: handle spread iterator item with no conversion in IOperation #71461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2344197 #71453
  • Don't start the cohost server at all if Razor doesn't want to #71416
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Snap for 17.9 P3 #71445
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Snap main into 17.9 #71446
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • PR feedback and cleanup after solution-state/compilation-state refactoring. #71389
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Upgrade BCL assembly to 8.0.0 #71444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change MapCode protocol to match it's form in VS #71415
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve parsing performance with large collection expressions of numbers #71443
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Collection expressions: tests for spreads of dynamic and non-generic IEnumerable collections #71158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: fix inline statement snippets in a "qualified name" edge case #71246
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Params Collections - Adjust binding in presence of dynamic arguments #71421
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Remove WPF dependencies from Workspace and Features test layers #71392
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bug fix #71403 #71420
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
